title: [Medicine] Russian scientists have synthesized chemical compounds that can stop the degeneration of neurons in Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, and other severe brain pathologies. These substances can provide a breakthrough in the treatment of neurodegenerative pathologies.

[Health] Scientists found that disturbance in slow-wave activity during non-rapid eye movement sleep is linked with mechanical and thermal hyperalgesia. https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-021-93560-7
